name: Chamrosh
description: The Chamrosh is a Medium celestial creature with keen senses and a vibrant, agile presence, embodying a neutral good alignment. It has light fur and looks graceful in flight.
memorable: Known for its supportive abilities, the Chamrosh can heal allies and frighten evil creatures with its high-pitched bark.
goals: To support allies in battle and gather information from both friends and foes.
relations: Related to other celestial beings, it may collaborate with good-aligned creatures for divine purposes.
environment: Typically found in celestial realms or places of goodness, such as sacred groves or blessed sites.
strengths: Strong perceptive abilities and immunity to fear, allowing it to detect hidden foes and resist psychological effects.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits its strategic combat decisions.
attacks: Can bite for piercing damage and unleash a psychic bark to frighten evil creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Healing Lick enables it to heal allies and remove conditions, showcasing its supportive role.
senses: Possesses keen hearing and smell, granting it advantage on perception checks related to those senses.
skills: Proficient in insight and perception, making it effective at detecting deception and hidden threats.
additional_information: Advantage on insight checks related to lies and evil alignments.
Does not provoke opportunity attacks when flying.
Recharge ability for psychic bark can frighten evil beings.
Healing ability can be used multiple times per day.
Resistant to fire and radiant damage.
test_queries: agile healer that can frighten enemies
neutral good creature that detects lies
